column2: "Thank you for your report. Let's have a look... Yes, this should do."
"I hereby lift the cap on advanced difficulty missions for you, <%me>."
"Now, some advice just for you. Now that your difficulty cap has been lifted, your battles will become harder from here on out."
"Even the hostiles you easily dealt with before will be far stronger and are sure to turn their attentions toward you."

"A new Client Order is available for Franca.

Franca can be found in Franca's Cafe, or in the Shop Area, by the east block teleporter."

"A new Client Order is available for Girard.

Girard can be found in the Shop Area, by the west block teleporter."

"A new Client Order is available for Kressida.

Kressida can be found in the Shop Area, by the east block teleporter."

"A new Client Order is available for Zieg.

Zieg can be found in the Shop Area, Monument Plaza."
